app-description: Pascal is a professional-grade 3-in-1 scientific, graphing and programmer calculator.
call-to-action: Get it now for FREE on the App Store
scientific-feature-1-description: Supporting 16 significant digits of precision and a variety of unconventional functions, including decimal factorials, combinations, permutations, gradians, and modulo operation.
scientific-feature-2-description: Syntax highlighting, responsive buttons, and a flexible keypad to switch between full functionality or a minimal, clutter-free layout.
scientific-feature-3-description: Reverse Polish notation (RPN), or postfix notation, supporting up to 99 entries.
graphing-feature-1-description: Directly compose and evaluate math expressions on the tape with less typing—brackets are automatically multiplied out and closed.
graphing-feature-2-description: Using adaptive sampling algorithm to generate plots and negate asymptotes. The field-of-view can be altered and points-of-interest can be traced via simple gestures.
programmer-feature-1-description: 64-bit operations supporting binary, octal, decimal and hexadecimal numeral systems.
programmer-feature-2-description: On-screen ASCII or UTF-16 character encoding.
programmer-feature-3-description: RPN mode available similar to the scientific calculator.
extensions-feature-1-description: Quick calculations from the Today View without unlocking your device.
extensions-feature-2-description: Standalone basic calculator  directly on your Apple Watch.
